This is a project by Elom A. analyzing data about CO2 emissions from cars in Canada. It uses the Carbon dioxide emissions dataset from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/debajyotipodder/co2-emission-by-vehicles?select=CO2+Emissions_Canada.csv)
